mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FVRTS f INNER JOIN GD_TR_RCRT g ON f.GD_TR_PST_ID =g.GD_TR_PST_ID INNER JOIN CITIES c ON g.TR_CT_ID = c.CITY_ID INNER JOIN COUNTRIES cn ON c.COUNTRY_ID = cn.COUNTRY_ID WHERE g.ATHR_ID = #{loginId} AND f.FAV_IS_DLT = 'N'
